title: Will You Die if You Don’t Pretend to be Forced? - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural   Yuri
tags: Apocalypse   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Ghosts   Overpowered Protagonist   Soul Power   Tragic Past   World Hopping   World Travel
author: 柒殇祭
description:
I heard that recently the Underworld has opened a new “present life” business—

Jiang Yuyan, as a salesperson in the emotional unit, started her helper business on Earth.

“I have a commission! I want to retaliate against those scum men and women!”

“The Underworld’s self-service system has accepted your request.”

“I have a request! Please bring my ex-boyfriend down too!”

“The local government self-service system has accepted your request. Commissioned.”

..Huh, wait! Bring down?

The system was stunned: Wait, Jiang Yuyan… stop! We are not omnipotent! This commission cannot be accepted!

There are fewer scum men and women in the world, but the system of the Underworld is crying—

Jiang Yuyan, don’t pretend to be forced by the Underworld!>
